devdoc.details: Registry id `6` in the Curve address provider

EmptyAddressProvider().details: Revert if address provider address is empty

InvalidPriceProviderRepository().details: Revert on a false sanity check with `Ping` library

OnlyManager().details: Revert if `msg.sender` is not Price Providers Repository manager

RegistryIsTheSame().details: Revert if Curve registry is not changed

RegistryNotFoundById(uint8).details: Revert if in the Curve address provider the registry is not found by the provided registry id

constructor.details: Constructor is required for indirect CurveRegistriesBaseFetcher and PriceProvidersRepositoryManager initialization. Arguments for CurveRegistriesBaseFetcher initialization are given in the modifier-style in the derived constructor. CurveCryptoPoolRegistryFetcher constructor body should be empty as we need to do nothing.

getLPTokenDetails(address,bytes).details: This method should not revert. If the data is not found or provided an invalid LP token address, it should return an empty data structure.

params._data: Any additional data that can be required

MAX_NUMBER_OF_COINS.details: Number of coins by the Curve Main Registry interface

devdoc.title: Curve LP Tokens details fetcher for Cryptopool Registry

RegistryUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when Curve LP registry address has been updated

curveLPTokensDetailsFetcherPing().notice: Helper method that allows easily detects, if contract is Curve Registry Fatcher

updateRegistry().notice: Pulls a registry address from the Curve address provider
